'''Radiant Spincrystal 124''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Springtide of Qiaoying]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a stone bench in a courtyard in [[Qiaoying Village]].
